Famous anchor Suma Kanakala‚Äôs son, Roshan Kanakala, debuted in Tollywood with the romantic entertainer Bubblegum. He has now teamed up with director Sandeep Raj for his second film, Mowgli 2025, set against a forest backdrop.

  • Producer Vishwa Prasad began the proceedings by handing over the script to director Sandeep Raj.

  • Mega director Srikanth Odela switched on the camera to mark the film's auspicious start.
  • The first-look poster was unveiled, showing Roshan in a vibrant forest setting.
  • Kaala Bhairava is composing the music, and Rama Maruti M is handling the cinematography.
  • The film is set to begin shooting next month.
‚ÄúMowgli 2025‚Äù promises to be an engaging romantic entertainer set in a lush forest environment.

The launch of Mowgli 2025 is an exciting step for Roshan Kanakala, as he builds on his initial success with his debut film.

title: Horoscope Today: Astrological prediction for December 20, 2024 - Hindustan Times
summary:
Horoscope Today: Astrological Prediction for December 20, 2024

Date: Dec 20, 2024
Source: Hindustan Times

The article provides daily astrological predictions for all zodiac signs focusing on what individuals can expect on December 20, 2024. It offers insights into health, finances, and personal relationships for each sign.

  • Predictions for Aries suggest neglecting health could delay their fitness goals and recommend financial conservatism.
  • Taurus foresee an influx of funds and emphasize the joy that comes from family successes.
  • Gemini might deal with minor health issues and higher expenses but can expect essential trips to help achieve their dreams.
  • Cancer individuals are expected to be motivated to improve their health despite feeling less energetic.
  • Leo are encouraged to be cautious with finances but can anticipate successes at work.
  • Virgo can expect stress from property concerns but favorable business deals might be on the horizon.
  • Libra may find physical activities challenging but could see valuable property opportunities arising.
  • Scorpio might experience a windfall and face potential ancestral property issues affecting family dynamics.
  • Sagittarius can anticipate stability in their financial outlook while avoiding risks.
  • Capricorn should prepare for unexpected expenses related to loved ones but will see appreciation in family obligations.
  • Aquarius will enjoy health improvements through activity, with potential for lucrative property investments.
  • Pisces may deal with criticism at work but will take steps to create harmony at home.
"Love Focus: Romance unfolds slowly as you take things carefully." - Pisces

This horoscope highlights the varying energies for each sign, indicating opportunities and challenges that may lie ahead, fostering a greater awareness and understanding of astrological influences.

Source: News18

Mukesh Khanna has raised eyebrows with his remarks concerning Ranbir Kapoor, who has been cast as Lord Ram in the upcoming film Ramayana. Khanna expressed concern that Kapoor's previous roles could affect how audiences perceive his portrayal of such a revered character.

  • Khanna hesitated to comment, fearing backlash, but affirmed that comparisons with Arun Govil are inevitable.
  • He stated that whoever plays Ram must embody the character in their real life as well.
  • Khanna highlighted that the public reception of actors like Prabhas should inform casting choices.
  • Ranbir Kapoor's role is significant for the Kapoor family, and he hopes Kapoor's recent negative portrayal in Animal won't overshadow his performance as Ram.
  • Details about other cast members include Sai Pallavi as Sita and potential casting for Hanuman.
‚ÄúIf you‚Äôre playing Ram, you‚Äôre not allowed to party and drink. But who am I to decide who plays Ram?‚Äù - Mukesh Khanna

The film is set to release in two parts, with the first part launching on Diwali 2026 and the second on Diwali 2027.
